com.plusauth.android.api.request

Class SimpleRequest<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plusauth.android.api.request.BaseRequest<T>
      • com.plusauth.android.api.request.SimpleRequest<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type that will be returned on successful responses
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizableRequest<T,AuthenticationException>, ParameterizableRequest<T,AuthenticationException>, Request<T,AuthenticationException>, okhttp3.Callback

    public class SimpleRequest<T>
extends BaseRequest<T>
implements ParameterizableRequest<T,AuthenticationException>, okhttp3.Callback
    Concrete implementation of BaseRequest class.
